titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation inhibiting the importation of pepper from forraine parts, by any other persons then those of the East Indian Company
Proclamations. 1609-11-30
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Giuen at Newmarket the last day of Nouember, in the seuenth yeere of our reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland. God saue the King.
Steele notation: vnknowen, parts 2) Subiects, that.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
